snippet.title: Temple of the Lizard Men 5: Official Trailer
snippet.description:
It is time to enter the temple once more - The Temple of the Lizard Men! This is the official trailer for the fifth and final installment of the beloved series. 

After 10 years of the Unreal inspired DOOM wad series, this last iteration will give you an unforgettable experience.

Check out the project on the ZDoom forums - It's all DONE!
https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=68259

***NOTE: What you see in this trailer is subject to change in the final version.***

What does Temple of the Lizard Men 5 bring to the series?

- Larger and more complex maps.
- Two hub maps allowing the player to choose which level they want to play first and in whatever order they want.
- At the end of each map, there is a puzzle item the player will pick up and use within the hub levels.
- Less arsenal that requires reloading (More runnin' n gunnin'!).
- Smaller wad/pk3 file size.
- Expands compatibility from GZDoom 1.8.2 to the current version of GZDoom.
- Compatible with Zandronum 3.0
- Compatible with LZDoom

MUSIC CREDIT:
Luke Jansen - Heretic Graveyard theme remix
TeknoAxe


***Want to support me? Purchase my book series on amazon.com!***

***Book Series Link***
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08P9NBLXJ/ref=sr_1_2?dchild=1&keywords=Alan+Duin&qid=1606688206&sr=8-2

***Adventures of the PPA: Invasion*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08P3H15KQ

***Adventures of the PPA: Venomous Vengeance*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/dp/1795526491

***Adventures of the PPA: Project Resurrection*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0875YZFD5

***Adventures of the PPA: The Genesis Cube*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B09VQBCY45?ref_=dbs_m_mng_rwt_calw_tpbk_3&storeType=ebooks&qid=1648159067&sr=1-1
